mapper.insert: INSERT INTO categroup(categrpno, categrpname, categrpseqno, categrpvisible) values( (select nvl(max(categrpno),0) +1 as categrpno from categroup), #{categrpName}, #{categrpSeqno}, #{categrpVisible} )
mapper.select: select categrpno,categrpname,categrpcnt,categrpseqno,categrpvisible,categrprdate from categroup order by categrprdate desc
select count(*) as count from categroup
select categrpname,categrpcnt,categrpseqno from categroup where categrpvisible = 'Y' order by categrpseqno asc
select categrpname from categroup where categrpvisible = 'Y' order by categrpseqno asc
